name: Public Activiy Chart
query:
SELECT 
    s.status,
    COALESCE(a.count, 0) AS count
FROM (
    SELECT 'Draft' AS status 
    UNION ALL SELECT 'Published'
    UNION ALL SELECT 'Ongoing'
    UNION ALL SELECT 'Ended'
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        status, 
        COUNT(*) AS count
    FROM `tabActivity`
    WHERE company IS  NULL
    GROUP BY status
) AS a
ON s.status = a.status
ORDER BY FIELD(s.status, 'Draft', 'Published', 'Ongoing', 'Ended');
